item.title: A New Approach
item.author: John Spickes
item.description: I want to try a different approach to my online interactions. I’ve played with Facebook for a while, and I’ve decided, for now anyway, that it’s not my thing. Other social media seem to have similar problems. Fighting Conversations on Facebook are too often heated. Maybe it’s that everything is open - all conversations potentially have an audience. Maybe that drives people to feel that they must “win” every argument.
